name: Invoke-Obfuscation RUNDLL LAUNCHER
description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via RUNDLL LAUNCHER
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*rundll32.exe* AND process.command_line:*shell32.dll* AND process.command_line:*shellexec_rundll* AND process.command_line:*powershell*)`
